title: Write log-error.md command
description: Create command to record errors during task execution for future prevention. Gathers error information from user, analyzes and categorizes error, determines prevention strategy with keywords, creates entry with generated ID, checks for pattern updates, and reports logged error.
notes: Created log-error.md command for recording errors during task execution. Implements 9-step process: gather error info, analyze and categorize (severity/category), extract prevention strategy (keywords/checks/patterns/warnings), check for duplicates, generate error ID (ERR-{CODE}-{NUM}), create error entry, update catalog, check pattern updates, report. Includes interactive mode and auto-analysis from checkpoints.
